content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254932,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレキシントン、アトランタ、ジュノー、初登場","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington, Atlanta, Juno, first appearance"},{"lineNumber":254933,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアトランタ．女姿まだ本調子では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Atlanta. Not quite in top form in her female appearance yet."},{"lineNumber":254934,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas Army"},{"lineNumber":254935,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス、リック","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares, Rick"},{"lineNumber":254936,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス殿がまた向かってきてくれているという話","translatedEnglishLine":"Talk that Lord Rance is heading this way again."},{"lineNumber":254937,"originalJapaneseLine":"新しく現れた魔人レキシントン退治ですね","translatedEnglishLine":"It's about defeating the newly appeared demon, Lexington."},{"lineNumber":254938,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レキシントンが戦場に現れたのはまだ１回だけだが","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Lexington has appeared on the battlefield only once so far,"},{"lineNumber":254939,"originalJapaneseLine":"それほど手強い印象はありませんでした。","translatedEnglishLine":"but did not leave a particularly formidable impression."},{"lineNumber":254940,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっとランス殿ならすぐに倒してくれるでしょう","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sure Lord Rance will defeat it quickly."},{"lineNumber":254941,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウエスの話題","translatedEnglishLine":"Topic about Wes."},{"lineNumber":254942,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争開始のどさくさで反乱を起こした貴族がいるバジールという男","translatedEnglishLine":"A man named Bazil, a noble who rebelled amid the confusion at the start of the war."},{"lineNumber":254943,"originalJapaneseLine":"５年前のヘルマン侵攻の際にも彼の父が反乱を起こしたが、まさかまたとは","translatedEnglishLine":"His father also rebelled during the Herman invasion five years ago, but to think he would do so again."},{"lineNumber":254944,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア様も危険視して政治的排除を進めていたのだが、間に合わなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Ria also regarded him as a threat and pushed for his political removal, but it was too late."},{"lineNumber":254945,"originalJapaneseLine":"反リア様の貴族を集めて立て籠もっている","translatedEnglishLine":"He has gathered nobles opposing Lady Ria and is entrenched."},{"lineNumber":254946,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな世界の危機という時に権力争いとはまったく・・","translatedEnglishLine":"To be fighting for power in a time of world crisis is just... "},{"lineNumber":254947,"originalJapaneseLine":"今はエクスの率いる４軍が対策に当たっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently, the 4th army led by Ex is dealing with the situation."},{"lineNumber":254948,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがリーザス城に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance arrives at Leazas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254949,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア、マリスとの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with Ria and Maris."},{"lineNumber":254950,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レキシントン、これが最近動き出した魔人","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Lexington, this is the demon that recently started moving."},{"lineNumber":254951,"originalJapaneseLine":"女性の鬼の魔人と報告を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"They report it as a female oni demon."},{"lineNumber":254952,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、サテラの話と違うじゃ無いか・・とサテラに文句","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, that's different from what Satera said... Rants at Satera."},{"lineNumber":254953,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、俺に興味を引かせない為だな","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, it’s to avoid catching my interest."},{"lineNumber":254954,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、そんなバカな、それに変だよ、だいたい鬼ってみんな男、女はいないはず・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera: That’s ridiculous, and strange. Generally, all oni are males; females shouldn’t exist..."},{"lineNumber":254955,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリス、私はわかりません、ただ女の鬼という報告を受けています","translatedEnglishLine":"Maris: I don’t know. I’ve just been told it’s a female oni."},{"lineNumber":254956,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、合えば分かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, we’ll know when we meet her."},{"lineNumber":254957,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日、レキシントンを倒しに前線に出発するランス","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day, Rance departs for the front lines to defeat Lexington."},{"lineNumber":254958,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの護衛にハウレーンをと思って呼び戻そうとしたのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"We tried to recall Howleen to be Rance’s escort,"},{"lineNumber":254959,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、第４軍はウェスの戦いで忙しくて難しかったの","translatedEnglishLine":"but the 4th Army is currently busy with the battle of Wes, so it was difficult."},{"lineNumber":254960,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、今回はリーザス秘密の魔法軍が護衛に付くわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"So this time, Leazas' secret magical troop will serve as the escort."},{"lineNumber":254961,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカとメルフェイスが挨拶","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka and Melface greet him."},{"lineNumber":254962,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここでチャカの説明は入れておく、マントが本体である事","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, include an explanation from Chaka that the cloak is the real body."},{"lineNumber":254963,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※または、以下のどこかか、道中にイベントを追加してもらって説明でも良い","translatedEnglishLine":"* Alternatively, add an event somewhere along the route to explain this."},{"lineNumber":254964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスの関心はもっぱらメルフェイス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance’s interest is entirely focused on Melface."},{"lineNumber":254965,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中、魔法軍の話","translatedEnglishLine":"Discussion about the magical troop during the journey."},{"lineNumber":254966,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカ、メルフェイス","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka, Melface."},{"lineNumber":254967,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスの魔法部隊は","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas' magical unit is"},{"lineNumber":254968,"originalJapaneseLine":"第５軍とも紫軍とも呼ばれているが数は５００人過ぎない","translatedEnglishLine":"also called the 5th Army or the Purple Army, numbering just over 500."},{"lineNumber":254969,"originalJapaneseLine":"エースであるメルフェイスにしてもゼス四天王や４将軍と","translatedEnglishLine":"Even Melface, their ace, is inferior compared to the Zess Four Heavenly Kings or the Four Generals."},{"lineNumber":254970,"originalJapaneseLine":"比べては劣る、が、リーザス一である。","translatedEnglishLine":"Though inferior, she is the best in Leazas."},{"lineNumber":254971,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはメルフェイスに色目を使うが、メルフェイスの側には","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance flirts with Melface, but beside her is"},{"lineNumber":254972,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジャロ（黒軍兵士）が居る、あいつはなんだと言うと","translatedEnglishLine":"Jaro (a Black Army soldier). When asked who he is,"},{"lineNumber":254973,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカはどもる・・メルフェイスも顔を伏せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka stammers... Melface lowers her face."},{"lineNumber":254974,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジャロが自慢的に言う、俺か、恋人なんだよとー抱きしめる","translatedEnglishLine":"Jaro brags: \"Me? I’m her lover!\" and hugs her."},{"lineNumber":254975,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスはあまり望んでない感じ、ジャロは調子いい","translatedEnglishLine":"Melface seems reluctant; Jaro is cocky."},{"lineNumber":254976,"originalJapaneseLine":"いかにもって感じで怪しげな二人","translatedEnglishLine":"A suspicious-looking pair indeed."},{"lineNumber":254977,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ・・むかつくランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... annoying, thinks Rance."},{"lineNumber":254978,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中、迂回するよりこのまままっすぐに向かいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way, we'll head straight rather than detour."},{"lineNumber":254979,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の勢力範囲となりますが、そうそう遭遇する事もないです","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it’s the demon army’s territory, we won’t often encounter them."},{"lineNumber":254980,"originalJapaneseLine":"すばやく抜けて北部のリーザス軍陣地にいきましょうと","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go through quickly and reach the northern Leazas army base."},{"lineNumber":254981,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物支配地に入ってしばらくしてから・・","translatedEnglishLine":"After entering the monster-controlled area for a while..."},{"lineNumber":254982,"originalJapaneseLine":"さすがに魔軍と遭遇する事が多くなったな、奴らの勢力圏か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Encounters with the demon army have become more frequent, as expected; it's their domain..."},{"lineNumber":254983,"originalJapaneseLine":"元はリーザスの国なのに、魔物の支配地になっているのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally Leazas' country, but it's now under monster control..."},{"lineNumber":254984,"originalJapaneseLine":"前回来た時は、俺様が魔人を倒して一気に押し返したはずなのに、また押されているじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Last time I came, I defeated the demon and pushed them back swiftly, but now they're advancing again."},{"lineNumber":254985,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないです、兵力数が違いすぎるので・・これでも善戦している方です","translatedEnglishLine":"It can’t be helped; the difference in troop numbers is too great... even so, we are holding on well."},{"lineNumber":254986,"originalJapaneseLine":"圧倒的な数の上、無敵の魔人、この存在がある限り、人類側は勝てません","translatedEnglishLine":"With overwhelming numbers and invincible demons, humanity cannot win as long as they exist."},{"lineNumber":254987,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様が魔人を倒すしかないわけだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I have no choice but to defeat the demons myself."},{"lineNumber":254988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":254989,"originalJapaneseLine":"村人とすれ違う、魔軍の支配地域といってもみんなまだ居るんだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Passes villagers; even in demon-controlled areas, people still remain."},{"lineNumber":254990,"originalJapaneseLine":"説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation."},{"lineNumber":254991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の支配地域といっても全ての住民が捕虜になったり、逃げている訳ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"Although it’s demon-occupied territory, not all residents are prisoners or have fled."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン、アトランタ、ジュノー、初登場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington, Atlanta, Juno, first appearance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ．女姿まだ本調子では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta. Not quite in top form in her female appearance yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、リック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares, Rick

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿がまた向かってきてくれているという話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talk that Lord Rance is heading this way again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しく現れた魔人レキシントン退治ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about defeating the newly appeared demon, Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レキシントンが戦場に現れたのはまだ１回だけだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Lexington has appeared on the battlefield only once so far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それほど手強い印象はありませんでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but did not leave a particularly formidable impression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとランス殿ならすぐに倒してくれるでしょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure Lord Rance will defeat it quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウエスの話題
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Topic about Wes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争開始のどさくさで反乱を起こした貴族がいるバジールという男
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A man named Bazil, a noble who rebelled amid the confusion at the start of the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５年前のヘルマン侵攻の際にも彼の父が反乱を起こしたが、まさかまたとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His father also rebelled during the Herman invasion five years ago, but to think he would do so again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様も危険視して政治的排除を進めていたのだが、間に合わなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Ria also regarded him as a threat and pushed for his political removal, but it was too late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反リア様の貴族を集めて立て籠もっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has gathered nobles opposing Lady Ria and is entrenched.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな世界の危機という時に権力争いとはまったく・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be fighting for power in a time of world crisis is just...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はエクスの率いる４軍が対策に当たっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, the 4th army led by Ex is dealing with the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがリーザス城に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrives at Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスとの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Ria and Maris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レキシントン、これが最近動き出した魔人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lexington, this is the demon that recently started moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性の鬼の魔人と報告を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They report it as a female oni demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、サテラの話と違うじゃ無いか・・とサテラに文句
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that's different from what Satera said... Rants at Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、俺に興味を引かせない為だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, it’s to avoid catching my interest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、そんなバカな、それに変だよ、だいたい鬼ってみんな男、女はいないはず・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera: That’s ridiculous, and strange. Generally, all oni are males; females shouldn’t exist...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリス、私はわかりません、ただ女の鬼という報告を受けています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maris: I don’t know. I’ve just been told it’s a female oni.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、合えば分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we’ll know when we meet her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、レキシントンを倒しに前線に出発するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, Rance departs for the front lines to defeat Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの護衛にハウレーンをと思って呼び戻そうとしたのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We tried to recall Howleen to be Rance’s escort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、第４軍はウェスの戦いで忙しくて難しかったの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the 4th Army is currently busy with the battle of Wes, so it was difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、今回はリーザス秘密の魔法軍が護衛に付くわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this time, Leazas' secret magical troop will serve as the escort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカとメルフェイスが挨拶
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka and Melface greet him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでチャカの説明は入れておく、マントが本体である事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, include an explanation from Chaka that the cloak is the real body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※または、以下のどこかか、道中にイベントを追加してもらって説明でも良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Alternatively, add an event somewhere along the route to explain this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの関心はもっぱらメルフェイス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s interest is entirely focused on Melface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、魔法軍の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discussion about the magical troop during the journey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカ、メルフェイス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka, Melface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの魔法部隊は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas' magical unit is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第５軍とも紫軍とも呼ばれているが数は５００人過ぎない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: also called the 5th Army or the Purple Army, numbering just over 500.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エースであるメルフェイスにしてもゼス四天王や４将軍と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Melface, their ace, is inferior compared to the Zess Four Heavenly Kings or the Four Generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 比べては劣る、が、リーザス一である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though inferior, she is the best in Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはメルフェイスに色目を使うが、メルフェイスの側には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance flirts with Melface, but beside her is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロ（黒軍兵士）が居る、あいつはなんだと言うと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro (a Black Army soldier). When asked who he is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカはどもる・・メルフェイスも顔を伏せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka stammers... Melface lowers her face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロが自慢的に言う、俺か、恋人なんだよとー抱きしめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro brags: "Me? I’m her lover!" and hugs her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスはあまり望んでない感じ、ジャロは調子いい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface seems reluctant; Jaro is cocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかにもって感じで怪しげな二人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A suspicious-looking pair indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ・・むかつくランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... annoying, thinks Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、迂回するよりこのまままっすぐに向かいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, we'll head straight rather than detour.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勢力範囲となりますが、そうそう遭遇する事もないです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it’s the demon army’s territory, we won’t often encounter them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すばやく抜けて北部のリーザス軍陣地にいきましょうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go through quickly and reach the northern Leazas army base.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物支配地に入ってしばらくしてから・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After entering the monster-controlled area for a while...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに魔軍と遭遇する事が多くなったな、奴らの勢力圏か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounters with the demon army have become more frequent, as expected; it's their domain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元はリーザスの国なのに、魔物の支配地になっているのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally Leazas' country, but it's now under monster control...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回来た時は、俺様が魔人を倒して一気に押し返したはずなのに、また押されているじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time I came, I defeated the demon and pushed them back swiftly, but now they're advancing again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないです、兵力数が違いすぎるので・・これでも善戦している方です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can’t be helped; the difference in troop numbers is too great... even so, we are holding on well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な数の上、無敵の魔人、この存在がある限り、人類側は勝てません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With overwhelming numbers and invincible demons, humanity cannot win as long as they exist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が魔人を倒すしかないわけだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no choice but to defeat the demons myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人とすれ違う、魔軍の支配地域といってもみんなまだ居るんだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Passes villagers; even in demon-controlled areas, people still remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の支配地域といっても全ての住民が捕虜になったり、逃げている訳ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although it’s demon-occupied territory, not all residents are prisoners or have fled.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

her."},{"lineNumber":254957,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日、レキシントンを倒しに前線に出発するランス","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day, Rance departs for the front lines to defeat magical unit is"},{"lineNumber":254968,"originalJapaneseLine":"第５軍とも紫軍とも呼ばれているが数は５００人過ぎない","translatedEnglishLine":"also called the 5th Army or the Purple Army, numbering just over Melface lowers her face."},{"lineNumber":254974,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジャロが自慢的に言う、俺か、恋人なんだよとー抱きしめる","translatedEnglishLine":"Jaro brags: \"Me? I’m her lover!\" and hugs her."},{"lineNumber":254975,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスはあまり望んでない感じ、ジャロは調子いい","translatedEnglishLine":"Melface seems reluctant; Jaro is cocky."},{"lineNumber":254976,"originalJapaneseLine":"いかにもって感じで怪しげな二人","translatedEnglishLine":"A suspicious-looking pair indeed."},{"lineNumber":254977,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ・・むかつくランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... annoying, thinks Rance."},{"lineNumber":254978,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中、迂回するよりこのまままっすぐに向かいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way, we'll head straight rather than detour."},{"lineNumber":254979,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の勢力範囲となりますが、そうそう遭遇する事もないです","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it’s the demon army’s territory, we won’t often encounter them."},{"lineNumber":254980,"originalJapaneseLine":"すばやく抜けて北部のリーザス軍陣地にいきましょうと","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go through quickly and reach the northern Leazas army base."},{"lineNumber":254981,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物支配地に入ってしばらくしてから・・","translatedEnglishLine":"After entering the monster-controlled area for a while..."},{"lineNumber":254982,"originalJapaneseLine":"さすがに魔軍と遭遇する事が多くなったな、奴らの勢力圏か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Encounters with the demon army have become more frequent, as expected; it's their domain..."},{"lineNumber":254983,"originalJapaneseLine":"元はリーザスの国なのに、魔物の支配地になっているのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally Leazas' country, but it's now under monster control..."},{"lineNumber":254984,"originalJapaneseLine":"前回来た時は、俺様が魔人を倒して一気に押し返したはずなのに、また押されているじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Last time I came, I defeated the demon and pushed them back swiftly, but now they're advancing again."},{"lineNumber":254985,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないです、兵力数が違いすぎるので・・これでも善戦している方です","translatedEnglishLine":"It can’t be helped; the difference in troop numbers is too great... even so, we are holding on well."},{"lineNumber":254986,"originalJapaneseLine":"圧倒的な数の上、無敵の魔人、この存在がある限り、人類側は勝てません","translatedEnglishLine":"With overwhelming numbers and invincible demons, humanity cannot win as long as they exist."},{"lineNumber":254987,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様が魔人を倒すしかないわけだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I have no choice but to defeat the demons myself."},{"lineNumber":254988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":254989,"originalJapaneseLine":"村人とすれ違う、魔軍の支配地域といってもみんなまだ居るんだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Passes villagers; even in demon-controlled areas, people still remain."},{"lineNumber":254990,"originalJapaneseLine":"説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation."},{"lineNumber":254991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の支配地域といっても全ての住民が捕虜になったり、逃げている訳ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"Although it’s demon-occupied territory, not all residents are prisoners or have fled."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン、アトランタ、ジュノー、初登場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington, Atlanta, Juno, first appearance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ．女姿まだ本調子では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta. Not quite in top form in her female appearance yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、リック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares, Rick

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿がまた向かってきてくれているという話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talk that Lord Rance is heading this way again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しく現れた魔人レキシントン退治ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about defeating the newly appeared demon, Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レキシントンが戦場に現れたのはまだ１回だけだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Lexington has appeared on the battlefield only once so far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それほど手強い印象はありませんでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but did not leave a particularly formidable impression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとランス殿ならすぐに倒してくれるでしょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure Lord Rance will defeat it quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウエスの話題
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Topic about Wes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争開始のどさくさで反乱を起こした貴族がいるバジールという男
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A man named Bazil, a noble who rebelled amid the confusion at the start of the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５年前のヘルマン侵攻の際にも彼の父が反乱を起こしたが、まさかまたとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His father also rebelled during the Herman invasion five years ago, but to think he would do so again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様も危険視して政治的排除を進めていたのだが、間に合わなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Ria also regarded him as a threat and pushed for his political removal, but it was too late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反リア様の貴族を集めて立て籠もっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has gathered nobles opposing Lady Ria and is entrenched.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな世界の危機という時に権力争いとはまったく・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be fighting for power in a time of world crisis is just...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はエクスの率いる４軍が対策に当たっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, the 4th army led by Ex is dealing with the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがリーザス城に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrives at Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスとの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Ria and Maris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レキシントン、これが最近動き出した魔人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lexington, this is the demon that recently started moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性の鬼の魔人と報告を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They report it as a female oni demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、サテラの話と違うじゃ無いか・・とサテラに文句
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that's different from what Satera said... Rants at Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、俺に興味を引かせない為だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, it’s to avoid catching my interest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、そんなバカな、それに変だよ、だいたい鬼ってみんな男、女はいないはず・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera: That’s ridiculous, and strange. Generally, all oni are males; females shouldn’t exist...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリス、私はわかりません、ただ女の鬼という報告を受けています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maris: I don’t know. I’ve just been told it’s a female oni.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、合えば分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we’ll know when we meet her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、レキシントンを倒しに前線に出発するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, Rance departs for the front lines to defeat Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの護衛にハウレーンをと思って呼び戻そうとしたのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We tried to recall Howleen to be Rance’s escort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、第４軍はウェスの戦いで忙しくて難しかったの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the 4th Army is currently busy with the battle of Wes, so it was difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、今回はリーザス秘密の魔法軍が護衛に付くわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this time, Leazas' secret magical troop will serve as the escort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカとメルフェイスが挨拶
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka and Melface greet him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでチャカの説明は入れておく、マントが本体である事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, include an explanation from Chaka that the cloak is the real body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※または、以下のどこかか、道中にイベントを追加してもらって説明でも良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Alternatively, add an event somewhere along the route to explain this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの関心はもっぱらメルフェイス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s interest is entirely focused on Melface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、魔法軍の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discussion about the magical troop during the journey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカ、メルフェイス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka, Melface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの魔法部隊は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas' magical unit is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第５軍とも紫軍とも呼ばれているが数は５００人過ぎない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: also called the 5th Army or the Purple Army, numbering just over 500.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エースであるメルフェイスにしてもゼス四天王や４将軍と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Melface, their ace, is inferior compared to the Zess Four Heavenly Kings or the Four Generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 比べては劣る、が、リーザス一である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though inferior, she is the best in Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはメルフェイスに色目を使うが、メルフェイスの側には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance flirts with Melface, but beside her is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロ（黒軍兵士）が居る、あいつはなんだと言うと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro (a Black Army soldier). When asked who he is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカはどもる・・メルフェイスも顔を伏せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka stammers... Melface lowers her face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロが自慢的に言う、俺か、恋人なんだよとー抱きしめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro brags: "Me? I’m her lover!" and hugs her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスはあまり望んでない感じ、ジャロは調子いい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Melface seems reluctant; Jaro is cocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いかにもって感じで怪しげな二人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A suspicious-looking pair indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ・・むかつくランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... annoying, thinks Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、迂回するよりこのまままっすぐに向かいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, we'll head straight rather than detour.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勢力範囲となりますが、そうそう遭遇する事もないです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it’s the demon army’s territory, we won’t often encounter them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すばやく抜けて北部のリーザス軍陣地にいきましょうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go through quickly and reach the northern Leazas army base.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物支配地に入ってしばらくしてから・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After entering the monster-controlled area for a while...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに魔軍と遭遇する事が多くなったな、奴らの勢力圏か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounters with the demon army have become more frequent, as expected; it's their domain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元はリーザスの国なのに、魔物の支配地になっているのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally Leazas' country, but it's now under monster control...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回来た時は、俺様が魔人を倒して一気に押し返したはずなのに、また押されているじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time I came, I defeated the demon and pushed them back swiftly, but now they're advancing again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないです、兵力数が違いすぎるので・・これでも善戦している方です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can’t be helped; the difference in troop numbers is too great... even so, we are holding on well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な数の上、無敵の魔人、この存在がある限り、人類側は勝てません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With overwhelming numbers and invincible demons, humanity cannot win as long as they exist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が魔人を倒すしかないわけだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no choice but to defeat the demons myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人とすれ違う、魔軍の支配地域といってもみんなまだ居るんだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Passes villagers; even in demon-controlled areas, people still remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の支配地域といっても全ての住民が捕虜になったり、逃げている訳ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although it’s demon-occupied territory, not all residents are prisoners or have fled.
